00043 class DZ_EXPORT DzIntKey {
00044 public:
00045     int             m_data;
00046     DzTime          m_time;
00047     unsigned short  m_selected:1;
00048 
00049     bool            operator==( const DzIntKey &key ) const
00050                         { return (m_data == key.m_data && m_time == key.m_time); }
00051 };
